base_description: Rectangular blue and white object with smooth edges.
part_description: The object has a long rectangular body with a white top and blue sides. A small square detail is near one end on the top surface.
internal_interaction_description: The white top surface is seamlessly integrated with the blue sides, providing a unified structure. The small square detail on the top may serve as a functional or decorative element, interacting with the surface by being embedded or attached.
external_interaction_description: The object can be placed on flat surfaces due to its stable, rectangular shape. Its smooth edges and compact size make it easy to handle and position, potentially interacting with other objects or users in a workspace or storage setting.
